WorkItem.ClosedComment: Updated server posted, confirmed those reforges load now (there was an extra string in the link preventing it from parsing correctly).
WorkItem.Description:
I was wondering why my expertise in raw (silverlight version on ej) is lower than in armory. Rawr says that bracers, gloves and belt are not reforged, but they are (see armory). I tried to import the char from battle.net serveral times yesterday and today, 
 
Same results.  Rawr does not import the reforging of this 3 items.
 
Char: Sahkyo on: EU Nozdormu
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Rawr is not importing reforgings of bracers, gloves and belt
